sentences.en: I am among them , among their battling bodies in a medley, the joust of life.
sentences.cn: 我也是他们当中的一员,夹在那些你争我夺 、 混战着的身躯当中, 一场生活的拼搏.

sentences.en: Joust for the fate of the kingdom!
sentences.cn: 一场决定王国命运的战斗!
骑士们骑马比武，嬉戏作乐。

sentences.en: To aim or thrust ( a lance ) in a joust.
sentences.cn: (用长矛 ) 刺在格斗中瞄准或投掷 ( 长矛 )

words.tran_cn: 进行马上长矛比武；竞争

trans.tran_cn: （中世纪的骑士）骑马用长矛打斗
trans.tran_en: to fight with lances(= long sticks ) while riding horses, as part of a formal competition in the past
